alert.note: Alert for St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 3:30PM CDT until May 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... Southwestern St. Louis City in east central Missouri... South central St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lemay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Louis, Belleville, Kirkwood, Webster Groves, Arnold, Cahokia, Swansea, Shiloh, Crestwood, Columbia, Sunset Hills, Shrewsbury, Glendale, Centreville, Dupo, Millstadt, Lakeshire, Oakland, Affton, and Lemay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
